programme.title: Milky Way
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Milky Way, S04E01, This episode traces our view of the Milky Way, from the mythology of ancient sky watchers to the efforts of scientists to map it from the inside out.

programme.title: Seasons of Saturn

programme.title: Superscopes
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Superscopes, S02E02, The human eye can only see visible light, a small spectrum of electromagnetic waves. Today, we have instruments that let us perceive all wavelengths.

programme.title: Virtual Universe
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Virtual Universe, S02E06, Our understanding of the cosmos is limited by the amount of time we have to see it. Fortunately, computer simulations can help us see how galaxies interact over millions of years, and even how dark matter structures the universe.

programme.title: Gravity

programme.title: Night Fire

programme.title: Circle of Friends
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S01E07, When 18-year-old Shannon Siders' body is found in the woods, everyone in the small town of Newaygo, Michigan, becomes a suspect--but no one is convicted of the crime.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E10, A detective vows not to shave until he solves the murder of a young Oregon woman. It takes three years and a string of Mexican Mafia informants to crack the case and allow the dedicated detective to shave his beard.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S09E02, The murder of an Ohio woman in 1974 is solved more than 20 years later after police get a crucial clue--the woman's husband was seen building a coffin-shaped box about the time the woman disappeared.

programme.title: Devil In Disguise
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E06, A 23-year-old teacher vanished the evening before Easter after giving confession. Her body was later found floating in a drainage canal. At the time, a key witness hinted that a member of the Catholic clergy may have been responsible.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E03, While hiking with husband Dennis in Montana, Leslee Larson fell into Wolf Creek. Then Dennis is convicted of murdering his wife, while in Main. And 15-year-old papergirl Penny Parker goes missing, then her body is found by a search volunteer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E06, A videotape made at an ATM machine helps police in Louisville, KY, to nab a man suspected of raping 13 women. And a DA investigator in Georgia helps crack a murder case that his father, a police chief, first worked on 30 years before.

programme.title: Killings on Christmas Eve
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S01E02, A family is torn apart by their grandparents' murders. Two decades later, a cold case detective takes on the case that has haunted him since he was a child--racing to solve it before the family takes matters into their own hands.

programme.title: The Voice In The Lake
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E01, When 31-year-old real estate appraiser Mike Williams mysteriously vanishes while duck hunting in the Florida swamps in December of 2000, authorities suspect he accidentally drowned. For sixteen years his disappearance remains a mystery.

programme.title: The Night Shift
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S01E05, College student Brad Perry shows up to work his graveyard shift at the gas station and is never seen alive again.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E23, When a woman is found murdered in her mobile home, police make two shocking discoveries--her husband may not only have been the killer, but he may have also killed his first wife 31 years before.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E23, The brutal stabbing murder of a Florida woman is solved when police find crucial DNA evidence in spit left on the pavement. And a man is put away for rape and murder when his footprint matches the footprint he left at the crime scene 18 years before.

programme.title: Traces Of Murder/The Bathtub Killer
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E09, A killer helps convict himself when he boasts about his crime to prison cellmates; and New Hampshire investigators probing the murder of a pregnant woman found raped, strangled, and dumped into her bathtub, get a new lead.

programme.title: Missing in Altoona
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E03, When Sherry Leighty goes missing in 1999, her family is left wondering how a dedicated mother of three could vanish without a trace. A decade later, the cold case heats up when Sherry's sister launches a social media campaign.

programme.title: Gone in a New York Minute
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S03E02, In a city of eight million, landlord Bruce Blackwood disappears without a trace in March 2006. Though there is no body, the NYPD is sure this is a homicide and they spend the next nine years searching for answers.

programme.title: The Clock Strikes Murder
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E16, When 23-year-old Tonya McKinley is found brutally murdered on New Years Day 1985, a little boy is left motherless. A family must wait 35 years for advancements in forensic science to finally catch a killer using familial DNA.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E24, A mother is suspected in the murders of two of her daughters when her third daughter finally convinces police to reopen two cold cases.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E20, DNA found on a marijuana joint in Florida in 2005 helps to solve the 1988 rape and murder of a California woman. And a cold case of murder in Illinois heats up when a jailhouse lawyer turns jailhouse snitch.
MST3K: The Shape Of Things To Come, 20220930000000 +0000, Emily's crew watch three humans and their robot friend defend the moon colonies in H.G. Well's THE SHAPE OF THINGS TO COME (1979).
MST3K: The Mask, 20221028000000 +0000, For MST3K's first-ever Halloween episode, Jonah's crew watch THE MASK (1961) in 3D! Jonah teaches the bots about Halloween.
MST3K: The Bubble, 20221111000000 +0000, Joel's crew watch as a married couple find themselves trapped in a mysterious town in THE BUBBLE (1966). The test subjects hatch a plan to escape.
MST3K: The Christmas Dragon, 20221216000000 +0000, All three hosts watch a group of precocious orphans attempt save a dying Father Christmas in THE CHRISTMAS DRAGON (2014).

programme.title: The Screaming Skull
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Screaming Skull, S10E12, Newly-married wife Jenni can't tell if the skull she sees in her new home is a ghostly apparition of her husband's dead first wife, hallucinations from her own nervous condition... or something else.

programme.title: Mitchell
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Mitchell, S05E12, The trio sit through a dreary Joe Don Baker disasterpiece as Gypsy tries to find a way to save Joel from being killed by the Mads.
MST3K: Prince Of Space, 19970816000000 +0000, A wimpy space hero kicks tyrannical aliens off of Earth while the Widowmaker and the SOL are sucked through a wormhole.

MST3K: The Final Sacrifice, 19980725000000 +0000, With the help of a mysterious map and a truck-driving drifter named Rowsdower, young Troy McGreggor sets out on a dark adventure across Alberta in search of the answers behind the hooded cult responsible for his father's grisly murder.

programme.title: The Magic Sword
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Magic Sword, S05E27, Sword-and-sorcery film about a prince rescuing a princess from an evil wizard.

Kiss at Pine Lake, 20120519000000 +0000, Luke Garvey buys his uncle's Camp Pine Lake only to find himself the owner of a sinking business. Zoe McConnell, Luke's girlfriend from years ago, wants him to sell until an old flame is rekindled.
Home by Spring, 20180331000000 +0000, Hallmark Original Movie. An event planner goes undercover as her boss to plan the perfect retreat.

Calm at Sunset, 19961201000000 +0000, A young man leaves college to follow family tradition and become a deep sea fisherman. Stars Michael Moriarty, Kate Nelligan, Peter Facinelli and Gretchen Mol. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

Candles on Bay Street, 20061126000000 +0000, Sam and Lydia have a great marriage. They're committed to each other, and to their veterinary practice. But when Sam's high school flame comes back to town, it's a time of tension for everybody.
Come Dance at My Wedding, 20090606000000 +0000, A woman (Brooke Nevin) faces opposition from her estranged father (John Schneider) when she plans to sell the family's dance studio.

Grace & Glorie, 19981213000000 +0000, An emotionally fragile younger woman volunteers to take care of an independent feisty older woman. Stars Gena Rowlands, Diane Lane, Neal McDonough, and Carrie Preston. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.
In From the Night, 20060423000000 +0000, A writer (Marcia Gay Harden) forms a compassionate bond with her nephew (Taylor Handley) after the troubled teen runs away from his parents.
In Love and War, 19961218000000 +0000, A captured British Soldier and a courageous Italian woman fall in love in war-torn Italy during the Nazi occupation. Stars Callum Blue and Barbora Bobulova.

Love Locks, 20170128000000 +0000, A woman returns to Paris after 20 years and begins a journey of romance and rediscovery when she reconnects with her college boyfriend and first love. Stars Rebecca Romijn and Jerry O'Connell.

programme.title: Revisions
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S07E05, Six thousand light-years away, O'Neill and the SG-1 team discover a devastated universe where the inhabitants must live in a protective dome. They survive through an all-controlling computer system called the Link. But is it a savior, or a curse?

programme.title: Sanctuary
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E14, While searching a new planet, Sheppard (Joe Flanigan) and the team find a paradise world, Proculus, that would make an ideal sanctuary for those fleeing from the Wraith. The local inhabitants, however, believe their goddess will not permit it.

programme.title: Before I Sleep
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E15, During an exploration of the city, Sheppard (Joe Flanigan) and the team find an old woman in suspended animation. Thinking her to be an Ancient, the team wakes her up, only to discover that it is Dr. Weir (Torri Higginson).

programme.title: The Brotherhood
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E16, The team searches for a valuable Zero Point Module rumored to be hidden on the planet Dagan, where the Sudarians were trusted with the module over 10,000 years ago. In their search the team begin to worry about their new allies, and their motives

programme.title: Letters From Pegasus
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E17, McKay discovers a way for the team to send messages to Earth, allowing the team to send messages to their loved ones as the Wraith approach the city. Sheppard and Teyla leave Atlantis in the hopes of gathering information about the Wraith army.

programme.title: The Gift
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E18, Plagued by terrifying nightmares, Teyla (Rachel Luttrell) begins to recall a time when she and her father were captured by the Wraith and subjected to disturbing experiments. With the help of an old Athosian woman, Teyla looks deep into her past.

programme.title: The Siege (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E19, With a group of Wraith hive ships on the way to Atlantis, the team searches for a place to flee and a way to destroy the city. McKay (David Hewlett) leads a team to try and activate the Ancients' orbital weapons platform to destroy the Wraith.

programme.title: The Siege (Part 2)
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E20, Just as the team is beginning to lose hope, Col. Everett is sent from the Stargate Program on Earth. As Everett and the team strategize, a new battleship, the Daedalus, arrives with a new Zero Point Module, bringing with it new hope.

programme.title: The Siege (Part 3)
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E01, The team is saved with the arrival of Colonel Steven Caldwell, the Daedalus, and the destruction of the two approaching Wraith ships. McKay hopes the Zero Point Module will be the key to their success, meanwhile Ford seems off after an accident.

programme.title: Cloverdale
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E05, While exploring a new planet, Lt. Scott is attacked by an aggressive plant-like creature that infects him. Scott's circumstances turn dire and Tamara must search for a way to stop the alien infection from spreading while more creatures move in.

programme.title: Trial And Error
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E06, Col. Young (Louis Ferreira) is plagued by a recurring vision wherein Destiny is attacked and destroyed by aliens. After placing the crew on high alert, he starts to feel that he may be losing his mind and questions his ability as the commander!

programme.title: The Greater Good
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E07, When Destiny comes upon a heavily damaged ship, Dr. Rush and Col. Young decide to make a dangerous space-suited expedition to the ship. But an unexpected turn of events leaves Dr. Rush and Col. Young stranded aboard the strange vessel.

programme.title: Malice
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E08, Lucian Alliance prisoner Simeon escapes, creating a manhunt on a remote planet. But Homeworld Command orders he be captured alive, believing Simeon has valuable information. Simeon must be brought back to the Destiny before he kills or is killed.

programme.title: Lifeboat
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S07E06, SG-1 finds a crashed spaceship containing hundreds of people in a cryogenic sleep. Stunned by an unseen weapon, the team is struck unconscious and, upon awakening, discovers that several of the frozen personalities now inhabit Daniel's body!

programme.title: Enemy Mine
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S07E07, An SGC Naquadah mining operation is attacked by a native tribe of Unas. SG-1 is sent to protect the miners and discovers that the Unas are guarding land they believe is sacred. Instead of eradicating the Unas, Daniel races to negotiate with them.

programme.title: Space Race
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S07E08, The Serakkin Warrick proposes to share his planet's technology with Earth in exchange for Carter helping him win a space race. Carter eagerly agrees and copilots the craft through a perilous obstacle course; but the race isn't without risks.

programme.title: Avenger 2.0
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S07E09, Dr. Felger creates a computer virus meant to disable Goa'uld-controlled worlds. When the program malfunctions and spreads throughout the Stargate network, O'Neill, Teal'c and Daniel are trapped off-world, with danger looming around the corner.

programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S02E015, Emily invites everyone to a secret party at an underground club - where she does something that could end her relationship with Brandon forever.

programme.title: My Desperate Valentine
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S02E016, Emily refuses to accept the fact that Brandon no longer wants to see her and spirals out of control - and Brenda's the only one who might be able to talk her down.

programme.title: Fire And Ice
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S02E019, Brandon makes a connection with an aspiring figure skater that could melt ice - but is banned from seeing her by her overprotective coach.

programme.title: Everybody's Talkin' 'Bout It
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S02E021, Kelly's loose lips let slip an explosive secret that almost destroys her mother's relationship with Mel.

programme.title: And Baby Makes Five
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S02E022, Dylan's attempts to help a friend through AA put a serious strain on his relationship with Brenda.

programme.title: The Pit and The Pendulum
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S02E024, Brandon's father becomes involved in a lucrative real estate deal - until Brandon discovers that if the deal goes through, Nat will lose the Peach Pit.

programme.title: Meeting Mr. Pony
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S02E025, A robbery at the Peach Pit leaves Brenda more traumatized than she's willing to admit - especially when she must identify her attacker in a police lineup.

programme.title: Things to do on a Rainy Day
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S02E026, David leads Brenda, Kelly, and Donna to the Bel Age Hotel on a mission to meet the pop group 'Color Me Badd' when they come to town.

programme.title: Wedding Bell Blues
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S02E028, When the Taylor house suddenly floods from a ruptured water pipe, the Walshes reluctantly agree to host Mel and Jackie's wedding at theirs.

programme.title: Misery Loves Company
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S03E001, Summer vacation begins and Brenda starts lying to her parents to see Dylan. Brandon starts his summer job at the Beach Club.

programme.title: The Twins, the Trustee and the Very Big Trip
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S03E002, The Walsh's become upset over Brenda's relationship with Dylan, and Steve gets himself into a jam with twins.

programme.title: Too Little, Too Late / Paris, 75001
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S03E003, Brenda and Donna arrive in Paris while Dylan struggles with his father's plan to gain parole from prison.

programme.title: Sex, Lies and Volleyball / Photo Fini
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S03E004, While Donna works as a model in Paris, David wonders whether his heart belongs to Donna.

programme.title: Shooting Star / American in Paris
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S03E005, Brenda pretends to be French to spend time with an American student in Paris.

programme.title: Castles in the Sand

programme.title: A Song of Myself
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S03E007, It's back to school and trouble arises when Brenda, Steve, and Donna sign up to be "senior buddies".

programme.title: Rescue Me
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E22, Sean has a decision move to Australia or stay in Hawaii. Zack sees Leigh naked, leading to complications with her fianc Sam. Kekoa dumps JD and becomes a party girl. When Sam leaves Leigh at the altar, Sean asks Leigh to marry him instead.

programme.title: Panic at Malibu Pier
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E01, Craig rescues a woman that develops a fatal attraction to him, placing Craig's wife in mortal danger. A fishing trip goes horribly wrong when the boat explodes and Mitch and his mentor Al have to rescue its passengers, including Mitchs son Hobie.

programme.title: In Deep
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E02, Playing hooky from summer school, Lt. Mitch Buchannon's son Hobie gets dangerously involved with reckless jet skiers.

programme.title: Heat Wave
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E03, During the hottest day of the summer, Craig has to choose between his career as a lawyer and the job he loves being a Baywatch lifeguard. The choice is made when two boys get trapped in a storm drain which is rapidly filling with water.

programme.title: The Second Wave
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E04, Eddie must come to terms with his past when he confronts a gang of "surf rats" lead by a former friend from his reform school days. Trevor begins to doubt his lifeguarding skill when his girlfriend almost drowns because of his arrogance.

programme.title: Message in a Bottle
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E05, Hobie overhears his divorcing parents arguing and boats away to a deserted island with two friends, only to have their boat drift away, leaving them stranded on the island with modern day pirates!

programme.title: The Sky is Falling
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E06, After their plane crashes, two robbers attempt to retrieve their suitcase full of stolen money from the ocean. Meanwhile, Mitch and Gayle go to court over custody of Hobie.

programme.title: The Drowning Pool
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E07, A wealthy older man drowns under suspicious circumstances in front of Jill Riley's tower. Jill endures the pain of losing her first victim, becoming obsessed with unraveling whether his death was an accidental drowning or murder.

programme.title: Rookie School
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E08, While housesitting for Craig and Gina, Eddie takes in a runaway whose life is threatened by her mobster boyfriend. Meanwhile, Trevor enters Baywatch rookie school to become a certified LA County lifeguard.

programme.title: Cruise Ship
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E09, Eddie warns Shauni that her new boyfriend Andrew is not a good guy. She ignores Eddie until Andrew gives her a black eye. Meanwhile, Craig and Mitch must stop an out of control party boat before it crashes into the crowded Santa Monica pier.

programme.title: Cretin of the Shallows
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E10, Several people are murdered at the beach by a mysterious man in ghoulish make-up and Eddie is knocked unconscious by what he describes as a "cretin." Eddie's report is met with skepticism until the identity of the killer is dramatically revealed.

programme.title: Shelter Me
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E11, During a tropical storm, Eddie and Shauni take refuge in the Pomeroy's loft, turning a cold night into the start of a hot romance. In the downpour, two escaped convicts shoot Garner, then break into Baywatch headquarters and take everyone hostage.

programme.title: The Reunion
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E12, Craig gets jealous when Mitch reunites with his and Craigs old flame. Meanwhile, Eddie buys a classic Mustang for cheap, only to get arrested for possession of a stolen car.

programme.title: Armored Car
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E13, Jill teams up with Trevor to win a beach volleyball tournament, but all she really wants is to beat her former lover's team. Eddie and Shauni team up to rescue a young girl trapped in an armored car that topples off the pier into the ocean.

programme.title: Home Cort
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E14, Mitch gets a surprise visit from his old, mischievous Navy S.E.A.L. buddy and ex-Baywatch lifeguard, John Cort, adding serious problems in their already complicated relationship. And Shauni and Jill fight a battle of the sexes against a shady vendor.

programme.title: We Need a Vacation
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E15, Craig, Cort, and Eddie take a road trip to Mexico, but their vacation south of the border turns ugly when they tangle with an angry American tourist. Meanwhile, Captian Thorpe becomes Mitch's uninvited house guest. Hobie develops a crush on Shauni.
